HiddenText.Name: When will I hear back from BYU-Idaho on my application?
HiddenText.OpenningText: When will I hear back from BYU-Idaho on my application?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: We keep postings open indefinitely and applications are reviewed monthly. All candidates will be notified of their status by email within 8 weeks of submitting their application. Individuals selected for further review will be invited to interview as their qualifications match emerging needs for course instructors. Applications submitted to the waiting list will expire 2 years after submission at which time a candidate may reapply.
